column5: Study the rapidly developing field of biotechnology and get ready for a career improving the sustainability of materials and chemical processes.This course will give you an understanding of how the molecular and cellular mechanisms of biological systems can be utilised and manipulated to solve real-world biological problems. You'll gain the skills and expertise required for future developments in biotechnology, along with specialist knowledge in sustainable biotechnology.
